data.text:
ALVAN BOLSTER RICKER MEMORIAL LIBRARY:

Our Mission is to Encourage Community Members of All Ages in their Pursuit of Lifelong Learning by Providing Educational , Cultural Materials and Recreational Materials in a Welcoming Environment

************************************************************************************************************************************************

PLEASE NOTE THE LIBRARY PHONE NUMBER IS NOW:

LIBRARY PHONE NUMBER: 998-4601 EXT 6

************************************************************************************************************************************************

STORYTIME starting up Tuesday, September 10th at 10:00. Come join us for an hour of learning and fun. Reading, singing and crafting with Miss Tammy.

********************************************************************************************************************

TWEEN AND TEEN CLUB 2024

Come and join us starting September 10th – 3:30 to 4:30 Grades 5th to 8th

All tweens and teens need to register! Please come in to fill out a registration form.

Our goal is to have tweens and teens view the library as more than just books. We want to provide a fun safe place to learn teamwork, confidence and skills as they grow older.

************************************************************************************************************************************************

SEPTEMBER 24, 2024 ACRYLIC ON CANVAS PUMPKIN PAINTING CLASS @ 10:00 TO 11:00

please call the library or come in to sign up..space is limited. 998-4601 x6

************************************************************************************************************************************************

************************************************************************************************************************************************

INTERLIBRARY LOAN UPDATE:

For all our patrons that use the Interlibrary Loans System for ordering books. Starting June 4th, interlibrary loan service (also called “van delivery”) is temporarily suspended until further notice. This service allows patrons to request items from libraries throughout the state and have those items sent directly to their home library for pickup. This means, effective immediately, we cannot request any books or items from another library for you until the van delivery service resumes, and that could potentially take months. This pause affects all participating Maine Libraries. The Maine State Library’s contract with the current van delivery expires this month. While we do not have an exact timeline available yet, we anticipate the transition to a new delivery provider to impact most of the summer. We will share updates a soon as they are available.

GOOD NEWS: ILL IS SCHEDULED TO START TUESDAY, SEPTEMBER 3RD *******************************************

************************************************************************************************************************************************

https://login.librarypass.com/?library=library&domain=librarypass.com

Access to thousands of digital comics, graphic novels, and manga from 100+ library-friendly publishers — without holds, wait lists, or limits. Click on the link to the left to get access using Ricker Memorial Library’s name and your Ricker Memorial Library card number.

************************************************************************************************************************************************

************************************************************************************************************************************************

************************************************************************************************************************************************ PLEASE KEEP AN EYE OUT ON THE CALENDAR….LOTS OF THINGS TO CHECK OUT!!

************************************************************************************************************************************************

(Download Library) http://yourcloudlibrary.com/index.php/en-us/how-it-works Visit cloudlibrary to be able to download books on your phone, tablet and computer. *CLOUD*: Your Account Pin is: The last four numbers of your phone number that you have on file with the library. With the move to Polaris you will need this “pin #” to access the Cloud Library and your library card barcode.

************************************************************************************************************************************************

MAINE INFONET LIBRARY SYSTEM

Search Our Catalog Using MILS , you can go to SERVICES: from the above listings: click on Renew, Reserve, Request

To search our catalog using MILS go to: mils.polarislibrary.com

MY Library Account in upper right hand corner

Key in your name: ex. Jane Smith and your library card barcode

Click on Submit : which will bring up your account ..this will enable you to check what books you have out and books you would like to try to renew

***********************************************************************************************************************************************

CRIBBAGE CARD PLAYING FRIDAYS * Next time: * August 23 at 1:30 to 3:00. We have all the cribbage boards and cards to play with.

************************************************************************************************************************************************

THE FRIENDS OF RICKER MEMORIAL LIBRARY NEED A HELPING HAND!

Would you like to make a difference in your community?

JOIN THE FRIENDS!

Friend’s of Ricker Memorial Library is a small group of local volunteers who work hard to come up with ideas and exciting programs for the library. The Friend’s are in desperate need of volunteers to continue to support and provide programming for the community. If you have some time and would like to help out please send an email to http://www.rickerfriends.org.

************************************************************************************************************************************************

“MONDAY MURDER MYSTERY GROUP”

“LET’S TALK BOOK GROUP” WILL RESTART SOON ..(we hope)
